title: Gesture Gaze
description: A real-time sign language recognition tool for hearing impaired people.

title: Spoon and Fork
description: Food blog website where users can create their page and add their favorite recipes.

title: Market Pulse
description: A user-friendly interface explore historical data, compare stocks, visualize financials, and predict prices.

title: Image encryption and decryption
description: Encryption and Decryption of images using permutation based approach and 3-4 secret sharing.

title: Image Compression
description: This package reduces the size of images while preserving their visual quality using quadtree.

title: LIFO Job Re-scheduler
description: Implemented research paper for LIFO-based job rescheduling using dynamic programming,enhancing scheduling efficiency.
